content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

```plain text
7:15 | Wake Up
7:15 - 8:00 | Finish solitude walks list; Morning routine
8:00 - 9:00 | Fix blog (daily timeblocks don't like they're auto-updating), think of a way to add timeout to Notion 
9:00 - 9:30 | Set deadlines for small side-projects; get 80 hours cleared in the week (next week will be an experiment to see how feasible it is to get 80 hours of work done in a week); might have to think about ways to work on the go
9:30 - 12:00 | Install AdminControl on my MacBook (for real, $5 to my friend if I don't get it done by 12PM today)
12:00 - 14:00 | Finish writing Internet Intention Article (it'll probably be pretty scuffed, but then again the main purpose is to get my thoughts/ideas out there; I'm not looking to be a writer)
14:00 - 16:00 | Buffer time for Dialect calls
16:00 - 20:00 | Finish up ReactiveEmails Electron app; migrate all my emails to the new ReactiveEmails specification (the more I postpone this, the harder it'll be)
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:10 | Fill out Sleep Log; Brush Teeth;
7:10        | Eat Breakfast (while working on another task)
```

### Afternoon Routine

```plain text
13:10 - 13:20 | Solitude walk around the block (time to distance myself from one project and start work on the other)
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Fill out Sleep Log; Bedtime
```
